casebody.data:
Ashley STEPHENSON
v.
Gary BARTLETT. No. 94PA02-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2004. Phillip J. Strach, Cary, Robert N. Hunter, Jr., Greensboro, for Stephenson et al. Tiare B. Smiley, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Bartlett et al. Roger W. Knight, for Richard Morgan. J. Donald Cowan, Greensboro, for Marc Basnight.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of January 2004 by Plaintiff-Appellants to Take Judicial Notice:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of January 2004."

Justices ORR and MARTIN recused.
